body:
hallo Greg,
Hallo Michael,
Hallo jan,


Thank you for your responses, but still not sure how to proceed...




this is what i get when i type evalglare -h, i didn't know how to insert
the viewfile in a hdr picture :( ...




Last login: Thu Sep 12 10:39:52 on ttys000
nassif:~ nassifnassif$ cd Desktop/
nassif:Desktop nassifnassif$ evalglare -v
evalglare 1.11 release 17.01.2013 by Fraunhofer ISE, J.Wienold
nassif:Desktop nassifnassif$ evalglare -h
Usage: evalglare [-s][-d][-c picture][-t xpos ypos angle] [-T xpos ypos
angle] [-b fact] [-r angle] [-y] [-Y lum] [-i Ev] [-I Ev ymax ymin] [-v]
picfile
nassif:Desktop nassifnassif$




in release notes *(from documentation_v1.0x.pdf)* , it says that:


evalglare [-s] [-y] [-Y value] [-a age] [-b factor] [-c checkfile] [-t xpos
ypos angle] [-T xpos ypos angle]


[-d] [-r angle] [–i Ev] [–I Ev yfill_max y_fill_min ] [-v] [-V] [–g type]
[-G type] [-vf viewfile]


[-vt*t *] [-vv vertangle] [-vh horzangle] hdrfile


I mean the -vf viewfile...ist not included in the latest version, if it is,
once again, how can i include or fix it?


P.s: if anyone doesn't have problem to help me further, i can send one of
my hdr picture that i took on site....


Thank you all in advance!,


Nassif








On Thu, Jun 20, 2013 at 9:00 PM, <
